Comments_List: I partook in a series of conversations with Molly and my classmate Hazal in which we discussed the American landscape of the desert in connection with our work.
The level of discussion and feedback was excellent. The one thing I would say was that it was too hard for us to secure studio space for the class at the beginning of the semester.
It is a one-time independent project, so I can't recommend this one specifically, but I would definitely recommend creating an independent project in general.
